creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
inscription: 万延元庚申年六月廿八日　今戸広楽寺葬　尾上菊五郎　行年六十三歳 {Onoe Kikugorō Imado Kōrakuji sō, gyōnen 63 sai} (Onoe Kikugorō burried in the graveyard of Kōraku Temple in Imado, died at age sixty-three); 菊五郎妻　蝶　行年四十八歳 {Kikugorō tsuma Chō gyōnen 48 sai} (Kikugorō's wife Chō, died at the age fourty-eight); [...]
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: 應需一陽齋豊國筆 {ōju Ichiyōsai Toyokuni hitsu}
title: Memorial Portrait of the Actor Onoe Kikugorō IV and His Wife Chō
